name: Fertility - UN Population Division (2015 revision)
title: Fertility - UN Population Division (2015 revision)
description: The data for a particular refers to the 5 years preceding that year. E.g. 2015 refers to 2010-2015 in the original data.

fields.name: Fertility (UN Population Division (2015 revision))
fields.description: The total fertility rate is expressed as the average number of children a hypothetical cohort of women would have at the end of their reproductive period if they were subject during their whole lives to the fertility rates of a given period and if they were not subject to mortality. It is expressed as live births per woman.
